about.details:
Incorporated in Feburary 2007, HRH Next Services Limited is a business process outsourcing service provider offering services such as chat support, backend support, voice support and email support.

The company's current business clients are from telecom, foodtech, autotech, e-commerce, fintech, education, healthcare, government, banking etc.

The company's services are

Inbound Voice Process: This department is responsible for handling customer calls on various topics. Whenever a customer calls, the company's representative endeavors to resolve the issue.

Outbound Voice Process: This department includes two services: Outbound Sales and Outbound Services. Outbound Sales includes lead generation, up-selling & cross-selling, advertising campaigns and product launch campaigns. On the other hand, Outbound Services includes customer service follow-up calls, renewal reminders, order and invoice information, problem resolution and escalations.

The company is ISO 9001:2015 certified for quality management services and ISO/IEC 27001:2022 certified for the information security management system. The company specializes in providing business process outsourcing services, inbound/outbound services via phone, email, chat, social media and digital channels, business support service, chatbot support, consulting and related advisory services.

As of November 30, 2023, HRH Next has 284 employees who handle day-to-day operations, administrative tasks, secretarial work, legal matters, marketing, and accounting functions in accordance with their respective designated goals.

faqs.question: What is the HRH Next Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
HRH Next Services IPO is a SME IPO of 2658000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹9.57 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on December 27, 2023, and closes on December 29, 2023.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in HRH Next Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in HRH Next Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in HRH Next Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in HRH Next Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'HRH Next Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When HRH Next Services IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The HRH Next Services IPO opens on December 27, 2023 and closes on December 29, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of HRH Next Services IPO?
faqs.answer: HRH Next Services IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for HRH Next Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in HRH Next Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is HRH Next Services IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for HRH Next Services IPO will be done on Monday, January 1, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, January 2, 2024. Check the HRH Next Services IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is HRH Next Services IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The HRH Next Services IPO listing date is on Wednesday, January 3, 2024.
